resources.string: Developed by Cyriac, Jody, and Daniel.
Type in a location you want to focus on and click the search button next to it to search around the specified location.
Click on the search by current location to search around the phone\'s your last known location, based on your phone\'s location provider

Select a time and click search to find crimes around the specified time, the search is automatically focused on your last known location, if known, or Columbus as a wole, if your location is unavailable.
Type in a destination to get driving directions from the search location to the destination on the map along with the crimes and heatmap.
